content: A Sproutsies' Garden in the Bamboo Grove
A Dream of a Floofy Sky
I want a snuggly Kokoro Ichiryu Naturalist Home.
With a crispy <style=Highlight_MiYouZhu>green</style> color that matches its exterior, and of course, ideally made of <style=Highlight_MiYouZhu>stone</style>!
I hope the house will have that fresh bamboo scent, which will help me feel at ease when I try and grow all sorts of sproutsies~!
The stone house is glowing with crystal clarityâ€”wouldn't it be nice to spruce up the interior with some new stuff?
I hope that I get to see flowing <style=Highlight_MiYouZhu>red</style> clouds and immerse myself in the natural fragrance of <style=Highlight_MiYouZhu>wood</style>.
A Hat House Sailing the Highlands
The house, with its hat, is like a graceful raft drifting across the highlands. Just imagine it with some furniture... It'd be astonishing!
The books and materials need <style=Highlight_MiYouZhu>wooden</style> furniture for storage, and ideally, some additional touch of mysterious <style=Highlight_MiYouZhu>purple</style>. Yeep~!
Kokoro Ichiryu Naturalist Home
A cozy floofy home... <style=Highlight_MiYouZhu>blue</style> like the sky above, with furniture made from soft <style=Highlight_MiYouZhu>fabric</style>, like sitting on the clouds.
I miss the <style=Highlight_MiYouZhu>green</style> of the bamboo grove, and furniture woven from <style=Highlight_MiYouZhu> natural fiber</style> just like bamboo would be quite nice.
I want to smell the scent of <style=Highlight_MiYouZhu>wood</style> and see that sunny <style=Highlight_MiYouZhu>orange-yellow</style> in my own home, just like being in nature, mm!
The Mysterious House of the Vanished Thesis
Luminescent Stone House
Strange things seem to be happening at the newly expanded Faintglow House...
A dream of lying in the sky with my plushies...
If only I could pull that old dream of the Fluorite Islet into the real world and plant it right here on my turf...
Echoes of Memory and Dream
The books and materials need <style=Highlight_MiYouZhu>wooden</style> furniture for storage, and ideally, some additional touch of mysterious <style=Highlight_MiYouZhu>purple</style>. Yeep~!
